name: miki

this makes the second time today.

normalized: good grief you're a handful.

normalized: don't worry about me, miki.
i'm already all better.

normalized: i see… um, i'm sorry.
miki meekly bows her head.
but she's still avoiding eye contact.

name: rikurou
normalized: (gah, i must be creeping her out.
well i mean, it's not like it isn't gross for me either, seeing my bloody, shredded guts healing up in real time.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose, do you think that was the werewolf they were talking about just now?
the one 'drifter from the demon world?
i return to the present and ask annerose.

name: annerose
normalized: probably.

name: rikurou
normalized: your intuition again?

name: annerose
normalized: unfortunately.
it felt a little off when i slashed it.
it's a demonic beast for sure, but there's something else at work here.

name: michiko
normalized: oh, i thought so too.
it felt a little different from the ones in town.
like… creepy or something.
michiko raises her hand to speak.
she must be happy she felt the same thing as annerose.

name: annerose
normalized: what about you, rick?
you're the only one who made actual physical contact with it, after all.
annerose asks just to take a poke at me.
even though she already knows the answer.

name: rikurou
normalized: well i mean, it all happened so fast.
i got disemboweled and that was it.
sorry.

name: annerose
normalized: it all happened so fast… right…"
she sighs in disbelief.

name: rikurou
normalized: agh… sorry.

name: michiko
normalized: annerose, you're wasting your time asking this stupid human anything.
he's totally useless.
michiko cackles with glee.

name: rikurou
normalized: oh shut up.
why do you have to go after every little--

name: annerose
normalized: stop.
rick, if you've got time to fight with michiko then put yourself out there a little more.
you've been an immortal for a long time now.

name: mustache
normalized: yo!
save the kid's lecture for later, annerose.
we gotta discuss the damages to my business first.
mustache had come over after picking up the pieces of his ruined bar.
the other patrons are long gone.

name: annerose
normalized: er… a-anyways!
um, right, first things first.
fill me in on the details of your request.
annerose swiftly looks away from mustache and turns to face miki.

name: miki
normalized: o-of course… um…"

name: mustache
normalized: hold it annerose, my bar comes fir--"

name: annerose
normalized: quiet, i'm talking business now.

name: mustache
normalized: tch, whatever…"

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose is avoiding him.
in any case, miki begins her story at annerose's behest.
with a sadness unthinkable from the girl who'd just been going wild with a machine gun a minute ago.

name: miki
normalized: i mentioned it before, but the person i want you to look for is my brother.
his name is eiichi otonashi.

name: miki
normalized: it was just the two of us living together and… oh, ourparents passed away a long time ago… so it was just us living together.

name: miki
normalized: life… wasn't easy.
he did some… 'temp work' i think it's called, and he did a good job but they would always let him go right after.

name: miki
normalized: my brother told me not to worry, that he'd at least get me through school, but he was always overdoing it.

name: miki
normalized: i worked part-time, too, of course.
but… i don't think it eased his burden much.

name: miki
normalized: it was six months ago when everything changed.
when he told me he'd 'landed a big job.

name: miki
normalized: when i asked what kind, he said he couldn't tell me sinceit was a company secret.

name: miki
normalized: at the time i thought it was a little weird he couldn't even tell his own family, but he seemed really happy about it so i let it go.

name: miki
normalized: but deep down, i knew i should've stopped him.
if i had, then he'd still be…"

name: annerose
normalized: and then…?
annerose asks miki to continue from where she was silently staring at the floor.
her expression is scarily calm.

name: miki
normalized: sorry… and then he went off on that 'big job.
' he saidhe wouldn't be home for awhile but that everything would be okay.

name: annerose
normalized: and he hasn't been back since.
miki nods.

name: miki
normalized: but there were regular bank deposits coming every month.
huge amounts like i've never seen before.
miki quietly said how much.
it was a staggering amount even for me, who'd lost my sense of money from annerose's jobs.
that's if it was a normal job, though.

name: annerose
normalized: --so why amidahara?
did your brother say he was coming here?

name: miki
normalized: this.
miki takes out a letter.
there in shaky handwriting reads, "miki, i'm waiting for you in amidahara.

name: miki
normalized: and that's when the money suddenly stopped coming in.
no, i don't even care about the money.
i'm just worried about my brother, that's all.
miki bites her lip.
it looks like she's trying hard not to cry.

name: miki
normalized: please, miss annerose.
if he's in this city, please, find my brother.

name: miki
normalized: if he's gotten involved in something dangerous, please rescue him.
i'll pay whatever you want.
i'll give you everything i have.

name: miki
normalized: so please, save my brother, i beg you.
miki said with a deep bow.

name: mustache
normalized: i thought you were just a crazy little runt, but you're a wonderful little sister who's only worried about her big brother…"
mustache who'd been listening off to the side looked ready to burst into tears.
for being a slaver on the side, does he have a soft spot for stories like this?
but thoughts of the family that i'd long ago forgotten, no, that i forced myself to forget came back to me as well.
my life was saved by annerose, and i became an immortal.
officially however, i'd gone missing on a school trip inamidahara -- meaning the world considers me dead.
my parents should've been informed of such.
how much did they grieve?
miki came to amidahara on nothing but a single letter.
i see the parents i left behind in miki who's worried about her brother.
the sentiment of wanting to look for him, and the opposing urge to stop her churn within me.
because it's not hard to imagine.
if her brother truly did come to amidahara, he's likely… already…
that's the kind of place this is.
the only reason i'm alive at all is because i happened to catch annerose's eye.
that's all.
annerose silently judges miki with her head bowed low.
her expression says nothing of what she's thinking.

name: annerose
normalized: rick.

name: rikurou
normalized: ma'am.

name: annerose
normalized: what do you think?
she asks without taking her eyes off miki.
whether she means the story just now, or whether we should take the job, i couldn't tell.
even so, i answer.

name: rikurou
normalized: let's look for him.
it may only serve to confirm his death.
but that's still better than continuing to suffer between the anxiety of the unknown, and the hope that he could still be alive out there, somewhere.
after a quick glance at me, annerose returns her gaze to miki.

name: annerose
normalized: yeah, alright then.
we'll look for your brother.

name: miki
normalized: you will!?
thank you so much!
i'm in your debt, miss annerose!
miki lifts her head in a flash, then bows over and over again.

name: michiko
normalized: i just knew you'd say yes.
i really wanted to take your request, too.
michiko pipes up, ignoring the fact nobody even asked her.

name: michiko
normalized: we're not working on anything else, and it's just findinga missing person.
we'll knock this one out in no time.
uh-huh, as usual she doesn't have a clue…

name: annerose
normalized: oh?

i just like miki.

simply wonderful.

name: miki
normalized: huh…?
u-um… th-thank you, ahaha…"

i'm so happy.

normalized: (wh-why～～)

normalized: ah!
i-i'm sorry… b-but that whole regeneration thing earlier really did creep me ou-- er, no, i-it was very surprising…"

uhuu…
